Definition.WordDefinition: Pacific, MO (city, FIPS 55910) Location: 38.47833 N, 90.75292 W Population (1990): 4350 (1811 housing units) Area: 8.8 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 63069 Pacific, WA (city, FIPS 52495) Location: 47.26575 N, 122.24672 W Population (1990): 4622 (1815 housing units) Area: 5.1 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 98047

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
pacific \pa*cif"ic\, a. [L. pacificus: cf. F. pacifique. See {Pacify}.] Of or pertaining to peace; of a peaceful character; not warlike; not quarrelsome; as, a pacific nature or condition. [WordNet sense 3]
Syn: peaceable. [1913 Webster]
2. Promoting peace; suited to make or restore peace; conciliatory; as, pacific words or acts. [WordNet sense 1]
Syn: irenic. [WordNet 1.5]
3. of or pertaining to the {Pacific Ocean}; as, Pacific islands. [WordNet 1.5]
{Pacific Ocean}, the ocean between America and Asia, so called by Magellan, its first European navigator, on account of the exemption from violent tempests which he enjoyed while sailing over it; -- called also, simply, the {Pacific}, and, formerly, the {South sea}. [1913 Webster]
Syn: Peacemaking; appeasing; conciliatory; tranquil; calm; quiet; peaceful; reconciling; mild; gentle. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Pacific \Pacific\ prop. n. The {Pacific Ocean}, the largest ocean.
Syn: Pacific Ocean. [WordNet 1.5]

pacific adj 1: promoting peace; "the result of this pacific policy was that no troops were called up" 2: relating to or bordering the Pacific Ocean; "Pacific islands" 3: disposed to peace or of a peaceful nature; "the pacific temper seeks to settle disputes on grounds of justice rather than by force"; "a quiet and peaceable person"; "in a peaceable and orderly manner" [syn: {peaceable}] n : the largest ocean in the world [syn: {Pacific Ocean}]
